summary: To complete the Vampire Armor set presented in Dawnguard, you can choose to wear either a Hood or a Circlet.
descriptionHtml:
I have made available head armor to complete the Vampire Armor set from Dawnguard.  At first just a copy of Serana's Hood, fit to be used by the player or another NPC if you choose to give it to them, I decided to also make a Circlet for those that may wish to not conceal their faces while retaining the benefits of defense and a full matching set.

They both have a Base Armor of 11 and are found on top of a shelf case in Valerica's Study, which means it also requires the Dawnguard DLC.

Aware that similar such Mods exist, I decided I'd make my own for personal use not only to make sure it was how it fit in with my own ideas but for practice towards future Mods as well.  I hope you enjoy and it can be of some use.

[b]Update[/b]
[u]Version 1.1[/u]: Fixed an error and set the items with Vampire Material (Boots, Gloves, the varied Body, as well as the Hood/Circlet) to gain double improvement from Advanced Armors.
author: Redden77
